mapper.insert: insert into order( order_id, user_id, car_id, order_generation_time, start_time, end_time, take_car_shop, return_car_shop, total_amount, prepay_amount, pay_type, position ) values( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{carId}, #{orderGenerationTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{takeCarShop}, #{returnCarShop}, #{totalAmount}, #{prepayAmount}, #{payType}, #{position,typeHandler=com.xiyan.model.typeHandler.PositionTypeHandler} )
